item.title: Python Scraphy
item.description: Python Scraphy ‘https://www.seek.com.au/jobs-in-information-communication-technology?highpay=True&salaryrange=150000-999999&salarytype=annual' scrapy shell httxxxx scrapy extrac response.css(‘title::text’).re(r’Quotes.*') [‘Quotes to Scrape’] response.css(‘title::text’)[0].extract() ‘Quotes to Scrape’ response.xpath('//title’) view(response) Reference https://doc.scrapy.org/en/latest/intro/tutorial.html
